entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetCustomAttributes throws Exception when attribute contains a type defined in a dynamic assembly. #101343
  • TensorPrimitives does not exploit its full potential #101326
  • Unhelpful error message for missing TypeBuilder.CreateType() call #101322
  • InvalidProgramException error message is unhelpful. #101321

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Collecting GC trace using perfview does not work #101328
  • `NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces()` doesn't list disabled adapters on Windows #89990
    9.0.0
  • AlpineARM32 Only, running dotnet new command will be Stuck with long time high CPU consumption after installing net9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24 #100536
  • ParameterInfo.DefaultValue with invalid universal chars has inconsistent behavior across runtimes #101332
  • Strange boxing deopt #82291
    9.0.0
  • On iOS, .NET 9.0 Preview 3 corrupts SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 2.1 memory after a while #101327
  • [browser] rename test scenario normal to WasmTestOnV8 #98092
    9.0.0
  • Expression.New() validator throws exception on implicit conversion of structs to interfaces #101296

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid unnecessary lazy init in StructuralComparisons #101344
    area-System.Collections
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #101341
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-coreclr
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change erroneous use of && to & when used to make a bitmask #101338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix Redundant bound check for span.Length == 0 pattern #101323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Cleanup unused functions on Windows #101334
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Cleanup unused MD5 functions #101335
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Remove unused x86/arm mach-support code #101339
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix missing explicit frame pop on arm32 #101147
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: optimize popped boxes in the importer #101303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mini] Use atomics, instead of loader lock, for JIT wrappers #100925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [cdac] disable live ILLink in a different way #101307
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable control flow guard for mono on windows #101293
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [release/8.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101305
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Refresh our "dev-innerloop" pipeline jobs #101304
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen/EqualityComparer.Default from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Only add interface methods to _virtual_methods cache #101139
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update System.Threading.Channels dependency #101101
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [Testing] Merge #91646 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Problems with libraries tests #2455

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement saturating semantics for float to int conversions #2552

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Consolidate HelloWasm IL projects #2535
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not force sections for 'ordinary' data #2547
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge apr 24 #2543
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish` for a Blazor project failed when I set the `CompressionEnabled` property to `false` on the dotNET 9 Preview 3 SDK. #40332

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inlining collection expression local into a spread could inline more aggressively #73148
  • IDE0200 recommends change that increases allocation #73147
  • Completion tooltips are not displayed sometimes #73124
  • Wrong IDE0055 in combination with CRLF, XML comment and preprocessor directive #73122
  • No completion for lambda parameter type if attribute is present #73121
    Backlog
  • No completion for constructor parameter type when attribute is present #73120
    Backlog

Closed

  • No semantic syntax highlighting until a change is made #73119
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34819.162 #73114

PullRequests

Created

  • Mmf cleanup with context5 #73154
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup with context4 #73153
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup with context #73152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup with context1 #73151
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup with context2 #73150
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup with context3 #73149
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup5 #73146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup4 #73145
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup1 #73144
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup2 #73143
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mmf cleanup3 #73142
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup our temp-storage (memory mapped file) code. #73115
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations due to multiple levels of ImmutableArray<FinderLocations> created during find references invocations. #73118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify lifetime management of ModuleMetadata instances created from pointers to managed memory #73112
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add single value cache to BloomFilter hash calculation #73103
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. (part2) #73094
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove solution replicatoin context #73117
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused async entrypoints #73116
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Increase mmf file sizes based on emperical data for roslyn itself. #73108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Cleanup binary version of clasp now that consumers have moved over #73096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution fails if user has group with brackets in name #55255
  • gRPC JSON transcoding google.protobuf.WellKnownTypes response/request cast error #55254
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55250
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot #55249
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55248
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55247
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55246
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55245
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55244
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55243
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55242
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55241
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55240
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55239
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55238
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55237
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55236
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55235
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55234
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55233
  • Resumable State Machine for Blazor #55232

Closed

  • Directly referencing the staticwebassets of QuickGrid results in compilation error #55009
  • npm ERR! request to https://registry.npmjs.org/@microsoft%2fsignalr failed, reason: unable to verify the first certificate #55203

PullRequests

Created

  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching

Updated

  • Fix duplicate error.type tags #55211
    area-hosting
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SwipeView in CollectionView misses binding when deleting an item after swiping open multiple items #21958
  • Grids inside Scrollview don't respect Margin and don't Center properly #21957
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal) returns different path for Xamarin.Forms and for MAUI on Android #21954

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    community ✨
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] `GesturePlatformManager.Windows.cs` - unused variable #21953
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in gestures #21887
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦

Updated

  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expression in the SQL tree does not have a type mapping assigned #33582
  • Exception when select over an empty left join #33581
  • Improve our SQL Server client-generated GUIDs #33579

Closed

  • Get all entites of a certain owned entity type #33577

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix string.Length translation after SqlQuery #33580

Updated

  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
